page.title: 10Our Questionnaires
page.content: To give us a better idea of what life is like for people in our village we decided to conduct a survey.We wanted to find out information such as what the population actually is.We hoped to find out about employment,unemployment and how far people travelled to work.We wanted to find out about the life styles of the people, how long they had lived in our village and what they liked or disliked about living here.To decide how many questionnaires we needed we used the Electoral Roll and had extra sheets printed for newly built homes.We divided our village up between the members of our class and delivered the questionaires.After about 10 days,we returned to collect the completed sheets.We delivered 37 questionnaires and 23 were returned.
